channel.title: Guide for SCAR 3.15b + SRL 415 Guide?
channel.description:
I'm looking for a good guide, detailed and all... [size=16pt][b]For SCAR 3.15b + SRL 415![/b][/size]
Nashi, it would be awesome if oyu would make one... But others can too :o OR send me a link

item.title: Guide for SCAR 3.15b + SRL 415 Guide?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

He’s not looking for an installation Guide
Just on how to use it,
Your best guide for SCAR is F1
As for SRL, Just keep scripting and ask what stuff does what til you know it all xD

Read full topic

item.title: Guide for SCAR 3.15b + SRL 415 Guide?

item.description:

[quote=“Gikon, post:1, topic:211941”]I’m looking for a good guide, detailed and all… [size=16pt]For SCAR 3.15b + SRL 415![/size]

Nashi, it would be awesome if oyu would make one… But others can too :o
OR send me a link[/quote]
Why would you need a guide when there already are some? Just search in the F.A.Qs section for SCAR and SRL installation guides
